description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A test of deduction and perseverance: engineer the grid's clues to leave no section devoid of laser beams. Once you've become a master of the board, challenge your friends in VERSUS mode, or challenge yourself with an endless supply of generated puzzles.
description.short: A test of deduction and perseverance: engineer the grid's clues to leave no section devoid of laser beams. Once you've become a master of the board, challenge your friends in VERSUS mode, or challenge yourself with an endless supply of generated puzzles.
